titleStmt.title: A brief relation of the beginning and ending of the troubles of the Barbados, with the true causes thereof. / Set forth by A.B. a diligent observor of the times.
titleStmt.author: A. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Cole in Leaden-Hall, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Printing-Press in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the sign of the Printing-Press in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange.
